description.value:
1. New Blood (200xp): Gain Rival (Nobility) from being part of an upstart Noble Family. Add +1 Profit Factor to Group's Starting Profit Factor.
2. Rivals (100xp): +3 Fellowship. Gain Rival Talent of group character dislikes and Peer of group that supports them. Make -10 Willpower Test to avoid acting out at rivals.
3. Decadent (150xp): +3 Willpower. Gain Decadence Talent and +5 to all Charm Tests. Gain 1d5 Corruption.

talents: Peer of group that supports them
